Plot: A profile of Ian Curtis, the enigmatic singer of Joy Division whose personal, professional, and romantic troubles led him to commit suicide at the age of 23.
Title: Control
Actors: Sam Riley, Samantha Morton, Alexandra Maria Lara, Joe Anderson
tomatoConsensus: Control is a work of art, thanks to its evocative black and white cinematography and sensational performances from Sam Riley and Samantha Morton. Even those not familiar with Joy Division can still appreciate the beauty of the film.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 30 wins & 32 nominations.
